3. Add Spices:
o Add the remaining salt, chili powder, turmeric, ginger paste, garlic paste, and yogurt to the pot.
o Mix well and cook for a few minutes to allow the spices to release their fragrance.
4. Add the Brain:
o Add the boiled brain pieces to the pot. Cover and cook on medium heat until the brain is cooked and the oil rises above the spices.
5. Garnish:
o Sprinkle garam masala powder over the brain masala.
o Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and ginger slices.
6. Serve:
o Serve hot with one 7-inch roti.

name: SINDHI BIRYANI
directions:
1. Fry the Onion:
o Slice the onion and fry in oil until light brown. Set aside half of the fried onion.
2. Prepare the Spice Base:
o In the remaining fried onion, add garlic paste, ginger, salt, red chili powder, cloves, cardamoms, black pepper, cumin seeds, bay leaves, cinnamon stick, and yogurt.
o Fry until the water is dry, then add the meat (mutton/chicken). Fry the meat until browned.
3. Cook the Meat:
o Add some water to the meat and cook on low heat until tender, ensuring the water evaporates.
4. Prepare Potatoes:
o Peel and cut the potatoes into large chunks, then boil them until half cooked.
5. Cook the Rice:
o Soak the rice in water for 30 minutes, then boil and drain when they are half cooked.
6. Combine Ingredients:
o Add chopped tomatoes, green chilies, mint, coriander leaves, prunes, boiled potatoes, and the reserved fried onions to the meat mixture. Mix well.
7. Final Layering:
o In a large pot, layer the meat and rice mixture, sprinkling the food color, kewra, and sugar over the top.
o Cook on low heat until the rice is fully cooked, allowing all flavors to infuse.
8. Serve:
o Serve hot with raita or salad on the side.

name: CHICKEN AND LENTIL CURRY WITH WHOLE GRAIN ROTI
directions:
1. Toast Spices:
o In a dry saucepan, toast the cumin and coriander seeds for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
2. Cook Onions:
o Add the oil to the saucepan and stir in the sliced onions. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring regularly, until golden brown.
3. Add Garlic, Ginger, and Chicken:
o Stir in the garlic, ginger, green chili, and chicken pieces. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the chicken begins to color.
4. Season and Add Liquids:
o Mix in the chili powder, garam masala, turmeric powder, and lemon juice. Add the chopped tomatoes and water. Stir well and bring to a boil.
5. Simmer:
o Reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring regularly to prevent sticking.
6. Cook Lentils:
o Stir in the lentils and simmer for another 15 minutes, or until they are tender and the curry reaches your desired consistency.
7. Serve:
o Serve hot with one 7 inch whole wheat roti.

name: SAAG ALOO WITH WHOLE WHEAT ROTI
directions:
1. Cook Aromatics:
o Heat the olive oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, green chili, and ginger. Cook for 2-3 minutes until softened and fragrant.
2. Add Turmeric:
o Stir in the turmeric and cook for 5 minutes, allowing the spices to bloom.
3. Cook Potatoes:
o Add the potatoes and red chili powder. Stir well to coat. Cover and cook over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring regularly to prevent sticking.
4. Add Spinach:
o Stir in the spinach. Cover the pan and cook for 25-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes are tender and the mixture becomes dry.
5. Serve:
o Serve hot with one whole wheat roti.

name: CHICKEN QORMA WITH WHOLE WHEAT ROTI
directions:
Instructions
1. Sauté the Onion:
o Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat.
o Add the chopped onion and fry for 4-5 minutes until softened.
2. Cook the Curry Paste:
o Add the korma curry paste to the pan and continue frying for 2 minutes, stirring to release its aromas.
3. Make the Sauce:
o Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan, bring the mixture to a boil, and let it simmer for 2 minutes.
o Transfer the mixture to a food processor and blend until almost smooth.
4. Cook the Chicken:
o Return the blended sauce to the pan, add the chopped chicken, and cook for 5-7 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked through.
5. Finish with Almonds and Yogurt:
o Stir in the ground almonds and yogurt. Heat gently without boiling, to avoid curdling.
6. Garnish and Serve:
o Top with toasted flaked almonds.
o Serve with one whole wheat roti.

name: TANDOORI CHICKEN WITH VEGETABLES
directions:
Instructions
1. Prepare the Chicken and Marinade:
o Preheat the oven to 200°C/gas 6.
o In a mixing bowl, combine the cubed chicken with yogurt, paprika, cumin, and turmeric. Mix well to ensure the chicken is fully coated.
2. Season the Tomatoes:
o Sprinkle the halved tomatoes with garam masala and set aside.
3. Assemble on the Tray:
o Lightly oil a baking tray with the rapeseed oil.
o Spread the onion quarters and red pepper pieces evenly across the tray.
o Place the marinated chicken pieces on top of the vegetables and arrange the seasoned tomatoes over the chicken.
4. Roast:
o Roast in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked (internal temperature should reach 75°C/165°F).

name: TANDOORI CHICKEN ROLL
directions:
1. Prepare the Pepper and Onion Mix:
o In a bowl, combine the sliced red pepper, red onion, coriander, and lime juice. Mix well and set aside.
2. Make the Tandoori Chicken Mixture:
o In a separate bowl, mix the yogurt with the tandoori paste. Stir in the chopped chicken until evenly coated.
3. Warm the Chapatti:
o Heat a dry frying pan over medium heat and warm the chapatti for ~45 seconds on each side.
4. Assemble the Chapatti:
o Lay the chapatti flat and spread the tandoori chicken mixture over half. Add the salad leaves and top with the red pepper and onion mixture.
5. Roll and Serve:
o Roll up the chapatti, tucking in the sides for a neat wrap. Enjoy immediately!

name: CHICKEN AND VEGETABLE BROWN RICE
directions:
1. Cook the Onion and Chicken:
o Heat the sunflower oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook for ~2 minutes. Add the chicken chunks and stir for another 3-4 minutes until slightly browned.
2. Add Vegetables:
o Add the red pepper, carrot, mushrooms, and aubergine to the pan. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring regularly.
3. Incorporate Spices:
o Stir in the curry paste and sultanas, mixing well to coat the vegetables and chicken evenly.
4. Cook the Rice:
o Add the rinsed rice to the pan, mixing thoroughly. Pour in the boiling water, stir again, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for 11 minutes.
5. Rest the Biryani:
o Turn off the heat and let the biryani sit for 5 minutes without lifting the lid.
6. Finish and Serve:
o Stir in the defrosted peas, chopped coriander, and olive oil. Mix well, ensuring even distribution, and serve immediately.

name: CAULIFLOWER STIR FRY WITH BROWN RICE
directions:
1. Toast the Sesame Seeds:
o Heat a small frying pan over medium heat and dry-fry the sesame seeds for 1–2 minutes until lightly browned and fragrant. Remove from the pan and set aside.
2. Cook the Onion and Leek:
o Add the rapeseed oil to the pan. Toss in the sliced onion and leek, then cover and cook over low heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until softened. Add the garlic and ginger, cooking for an additional minute.
3. Prepare and Cook Cauliflower:
o Spray the cauliflower florets with 5-6 pumps of 1cal oil. Add them to the pan with the onion mixture, along with 3 tsp of water. Cook over medium heat for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the cauliflower starts to brown.
4. Add Spice:
o Stir in the Tabasco or Sriracha hot sauce and cook for another minute.
5. Garnish and Serve:
o Transfer to a serving bowl and sprinkle with the toasted sesame seeds, chopped spring onion, and torn coriander. 
o Serve immediately with brown rice.

name: CHICKEN STIR FRY WITH BROWN RICE
directions:
1. Cook the Chicken:
o Heat the oil in a frying pan or wok over medium-high heat until it starts to smoke slightly. Add the sliced chicken and stir-fry for 2–3 minutes until golden. Remove the chicken with a slotted spoon and set aside.
2. Stir Fry Aromatics and Veggies:
o In the same pan, add the garlic, ginger, and chilli, and stir-fry for 1 minute. Then add the spring onions and red pepper, cooking for another 2 minutes.
3. Combine and Finish:
o Return the chicken to the pan. Add the lime zest and juice, basil, and soy sauce. Stir everything together and heat through until piping hot.
4. Serve:
o Serve it with a portion of steamed brown rice.

name: VEGETABLE PIZZA
directions:
1. Cook the Vegetables:
o Preheat the oven to 200°C (gas mark 6). Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and cook for 2 minutes. Then add the red and yellow peppers and mushrooms. Stir regularly for 7-8 minutes until the vegetables are evenly cooked.
2. Season:
o Stir in the basil, oregano, crushed garlic, black pepper, sundried tomatoes, and fresh tomatoes. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat, cover the pan, and simmer gently for 5 minutes.
3. Assemble the Pizza:
o Place the naan bread on a baking tray. Spread the cooked vegetable mixture evenly over the top. Layer with the mozzarella cheese.
4. Bake:
o Bake in the oven for 8-10 minutes, until the cheese has melted and the edges of the naan are lightly browned.
5. Serve:
o Sprinkle with fresh basil leaves and black pepper before serving.

name: Moong Dal Pancakes (Cheela)
directions:
1. Soak moong dal in water for 4 hours, then drain and blend into a smooth batter.
2. Add chopped spinach, turmeric, cumin, grated ginger, and salt. Mix well.
3. Heat a non-stick pan and pour a ladleful of batter. Spread it into a thin pancake.
4. Cook on medium heat until golden brown on both sides. Serve with mint chutney.

name: Quinoa Vegetable Pulao
directions:
1. Rinse quinoa thoroughly and cook in 2 cups of water until fluffy.
2. Heat olive oil in a pan and add cumin seeds, cinnamon, and cardamom. Let them splutter.
3. Add mixed vegetables and sauté for 5 minutes.
4. Mix the cooked quinoa with the sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

name: Chickpea and Cucumber Salad (Chana Chaat)
directions:
1. In a large bowl, combine boiled chickpeas, chopped cucumber, and tomatoes.
2. Add mint leaves, lemon juice, chaat masala, and salt. Toss well.
3. Serve chilled as a refreshing salad.

name: Grilled Tandoori Chicken
directions:
1. Make deep cuts in the chicken breasts for the marinade to penetrate.
2. In a bowl, mix yogurt, turmeric, cumin, coriander, garlic, lemon juice, and salt.
3. Coat the chicken with the marinade and refrigerate for 2 hours.
4. Grill the chicken on medium heat until fully cooked. Serve with a side of salad

name: Lentil and Spinach Dal (Dal Palak)
directions:
1. Cook red lentils with turmeric and 3 cups of water until soft.
2. In a separate pan, heat oil and add cumin seeds. Let them splutter.
3. Add garlic, ginger, and chopped tomatoes. Sauté for 2-3 minutes.
4. Add chopped spinach and cook until wilted.
5. Mix the spinach mixture with the cooked lentils. Simmer for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Oats Upma
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and add mustard seeds. Let them splutter.
2. Add curry leaves and chopped vegetables. Sauté for 5 minutes.
3. Add oats and 2 cups of water. Cook on low heat until the oats are soft.
4. Serve hot with a side of yogurt

name: Sweet Potato and Lentil Curry
directions:
1. Cook red lentils and sweet potato with turmeric and 3 cups of water until tender.
2. In a separate pan, heat oil and add cumin powder, ginger, and chopped tomatoes. Sauté for 2-3 minutes.
3. Mix the sautéed mixture with the cooked lentils and sweet potato. Simmer for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Cabbage and Carrot Thoran
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and add mustard seeds. Let them splutter.
2. Add curry leaves, shredded cabbage, and grated carrot. Sauté for 5-7 minutes.
3. Add grated coconut and salt. Cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Spiced Roasted Cauliflower (Gobi Masala)
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Toss cauliflower florets with turmeric, cumin, coriander, garlic, olive oil, and salt.
3. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway. Serve hot.

name: Brown Rice Biryani with Vegetables
directions:
1. Cook brown rice with turmeric, cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves until fluffy.
2. In a separate pan, sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil for 5 minutes.
3. Mix the cooked rice with the sautéed vegetables. Serve hot.

name: Yogurt and Cucumber Raita
directions:
1. In a bowl, mix grated cucumber, yogurt, mint leaves, cumin powder, and salt.
2. Chill in the refrigerator before serving.

name: Eggplant and Tomato Curry (Baingan Bharta)
directions:
1. Roast the eggplant over an open flame or in the oven until the skin is charred and the flesh is soft. Peel and mash the eggplant.
2. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and tomatoes.
3. Add turmeric, cumin, and mashed eggplant. Cook for 10 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
2. Add chicken slices and cook until browned.
3. Add broccoli and bell pepper. Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Masoor Dal Soup
directions:
1. Cook red lentils with turmeric and 4 cups of water until soft.
2. In a separate pan, heat oil and add cumin seeds. Let them splutter.
3. Add garlic, ginger, and chopped tomatoes. Sauté for 2-3 minutes.
4. Mix the sautéed mixture with the cooked lentils. Simmer for 5 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Spiced Roasted Chickpeas
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Toss chickpeas with turmeric, cumin, paprika, olive oil, and salt.
3. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, shaking halfway. Serve as a snack.

name: Vegetable Stuffed Bell Peppers
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds.
3. Sauté mixed vegetables with turmeric, cumin, and olive oil.
4. Mix the sautéed vegetables with cooked quinoa and stuff into the bell peppers.
5. Bake for 20 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Low-Fat Chicken Kebab
directions:
1. Mix ground chicken with garlic, ginger, cilantro, cumin, coriander, and salt.
2. Shape into kebabs and grill until fully cooked. 
3. Serve with a side of salad.

name: Fruit Chaat with Chia Seeds
directions:
1. Toss chopped fruits with chia seeds, lemon juice, and chaat masala.
2. Serve chilled.

name: Spiced Green Beans (Beans Thoran)
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and add mustard seeds. Let them splutter.
2. Add curry leaves and chopped green beans. Sauté for 5-7 minutes.
3. Add grated coconut and salt. Cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Spinach Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
3. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Serve hot.

name: Mutton and Lentil Stew
directions:
1. Cook lentils with turmeric and 4 cups of water until soft.
2. In a separate pan, heat olive oil and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
3. Add mutton pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add tomatoes, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
5. Mix the cooked lentils with the mutton mixture. Simmer for 10 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Beef and Bell Pepper Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
2. Add beef slices and cook until browned.
3. Add bell peppers and onions. Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Fish and Coconut Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
3. Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
4. Add fish pieces and cook until the fish is tender. Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Cauliflower Rice Biryani
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
3. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add cauliflower rice and mix well. Cook for 5-7 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Mutton and Sweet Potato Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add mutton pieces and cook until browned.
3. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
4. Add sweet potato cubes and cook until tender. Serve hot.

name: Beef and Lentil Patties
directions:
1. Mix ground beef, cooked lentils, onions, garlic, ginger, cilantro, cumin, coriander, and salt.
2. Shape into patties and grill until fully cooked. Serve with a side of salad.

name: Fish and Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
2. Add fish pieces and cook until browned.
3. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Chickpea Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
3. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add boiled chickpeas and cook for 5-7 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Mutton and Eggplant Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add mutton pieces and cook until browned.
3. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
4. Add eggplant cubes and cook until tender. Serve hot.

name: Beef and Sweet Potato Hash
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add ground beef and cook until browned.
3. Add sweet potato cubes, cumin, and coriander. Cook until sweet potatoes are tender. Serve hot.

name: Fish and Spinach Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
3. Add fish pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Zucchini Kebabs
directions:
1. Mix chicken cubes with garlic, ginger, cilantro, cumin, coriander, and salt.
2. Thread chicken and zucchini slices onto skewers.
3. Grill until fully cooked. Serve with a side of salad.

name: Mutton and Lentil Curry
directions:
1. Cook lentils with turmeric and 4 cups of water until soft.
2. In a separate pan, heat olive oil and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
3. Add mutton pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add chopped tomatoes, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
5. Mix the cooked lentils with the mutton mixture. Simmer for 10 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Beef and Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
2. Add beef slices and cook until browned.
3. Add cauliflower rice and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Fish and Tomato Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
3. Add fish pieces and cook until tender. Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Bell Pepper Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
2. Add chicken slices and cook until browned.
3. Add bell peppers and onions. Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Mutton and Vegetable Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add mutton pieces and cook until browned.
3. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
4. Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender. Serve hot.

name: Beef and Lentil Soup
directions:
1. Cook lentils with turmeric and 4 cups of water until soft.
2. In a separate pan, heat olive oil and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
3. Add beef pieces and cook until browned.
4. Add chopped tomatoes, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
5. Mix the cooked lentils with the beef mixture. Simmer for 10 minutes. Serve hot

name: Fish and Coconut Milk Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and coriander. Cook until tomatoes soften.
3. Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
4. Add fish pieces and cook until tender. Serve hot.

name: Low-Fat Yogurt with Berries and Nuts
directions:
1. In a serving bowl, spoon the low-fat yogurt
2. Top with mixed berries
3. Sprinkle sliced almonds and chia seeds over the top
4. Serve immediately for best texture

4. Bake:

5. Serve:
o Sprinkle with fresh basil leaves and black pepper before serving.

name: CHICKEN QORMA WITH WHOLE WHEAT ROTI
directions:
Instructions

o Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat.
o Add the chopped onion and fry for 4-5 minutes until softened.
2. Cook the Curry Paste:
o Add the korma curry paste to the pan and continue frying for 2 minutes, stirring to release its aromas.
3. Make the Sauce:
o Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan, bring the mixture to a boil, and let it simmer for 2 minutes.
o Transfer the mixture to a food processor and blend until almost smooth.
4. Cook the Chicken:
o Return the blended sauce to the pan, add the chopped chicken, and cook for 5-7 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked through.
5. Finish with Almonds and Yogurt:
o Stir in the ground almonds and yogurt. Heat gently without boiling, to avoid curdling.
6. Garnish and Serve:
o Top with toasted flaked almonds.
o Serve with one whole wheat roti.

name: SAAG ALOO WITH WHOLE WHEAT ROTI
directions:
1. Cook Aromatics:
o Heat the olive oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, green chili, and ginger. Cook for 2-3 minutes until softened and fragrant.
2. Add Turmeric:
o Stir in the turmeric and cook for 5 minutes, allowing the spices to bloom.
3. Cook Potatoes:
o Add the potatoes and red chili powder. Stir well to coat. Cover and cook over medium heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring regularly to prevent sticking.
4. Add Spinach:
o Stir in the spinach. Cover the pan and cook for 25-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the potatoes are tender and the mixture becomes dry.
5. Serve:
o Serve hot with one whole wheat roti.

name: CHICKEN AND LENTIL CURRY WITH WHOLE GRAIN ROTI
directions:
1. Toast Spices:
o In a dry saucepan, toast the cumin and coriander seeds for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
2. Cook Onions:
o Add the oil to the saucepan and stir in the sliced onions. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring regularly, until golden brown.
3. Add Garlic, Ginger, and Chicken:
o Stir in the garlic, ginger, green chili, and chicken pieces. Cook for 2-3 minutes until the chicken begins to color.
4. Season and Add Liquids:
o Mix in the chili powder, garam masala, turmeric powder, and lemon juice. Add the chopped tomatoes and water. Stir well and bring to a boil.
5. Simmer:
o Reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring regularly to prevent sticking.
6. Cook Lentils:
o Stir in the lentils and simmer for another 15 minutes, or until they are tender and the curry reaches your desired consistency.
7. Serve:
o Serve hot with one 7 inch whole wheat roti.

name: TANDOORI CHICKEN WITH VEGETABLES
directions:
Instructions
1. Prepare the Chicken and Marinade:
o Preheat the oven to 200°C/gas 6.
o In a mixing bowl, combine the cubed chicken with yogurt, paprika, cumin, and turmeric. Mix well to ensure the chicken is fully coated.
2. Season the Tomatoes:
o Sprinkle the halved tomatoes with garam masala and set aside.
3. Assemble on the Tray:
o Lightly oil a baking tray with the rapeseed oil.
o Spread the onion quarters and red pepper pieces evenly across the tray.
o Place the marinated chicken pieces on top of the vegetables and arrange the seasoned tomatoes over the chicken.
4. Roast:
o Roast in the preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked (internal temperature should reach 75°C/165°F).

name: Lentil and Spinach Dal (Dal Palak)
directions:
1. Rinse the lentils thoroughly and drain.
2. Heat olive oil in a pot, add cumin seeds, and let them splutter.
3. Add garlic, ginger, and sauté until fragrant.
4. Add tomatoes, turmeric, and cook until tomatoes soften.
5. Add lentils and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
6. Stir in spinach and cook for another 3-5 minutes.
7. Serve hot.

name: Grilled Tandoori Chicken
directions:
1. Mix yogurt with turmeric, cumin, coriander, lemon juice, garlic, and ginger.
2. Coat chicken with the marinade and let it sit for at least 20 minutes.
3. Grill the chicken on medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side.
4. Serve with a side of steamed vegetables.

name: Quinoa Vegetable Pulao
directions:
1. Rinse quinoa and drain.
2. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, cinnamon, and cardamom.
3. Add vegetables and sauté for 2 minutes.
4. Add quinoa and water. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 15 minutes.
5. Serve hot.

name: Chickpea and Cucumber Salad (Chana Chaat)
directions:
1. Combine chickpeas, cucumber, and tomatoes in a bowl.
2. Add lemon juice, cumin powder, and chaat masala.
3. Toss well and serve.

name: Baked Fish Curry
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Rub fish with turmeric, cumin, and coriander.
3. In a baking dish, mix tomatoes, coconut milk, and oil.
4. Place fish in the dish and bake for 15 minutes.
5. Serve with a side of brown rice.

name: Oats Upma
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
2. Add vegetables and cook for 3 minutes.
3. Stir in oats, turmeric, and water. Cook until oats are soft.
4. Serve warm.

name: Sweet Potato and Lentil Curry
directions:
1. In a pot, heat a small amount of water and cook garlic, ginger, cumin, and turmeric.
2. Add sweet potato and lentils, then pour in water.
3. Simmer for 20 minutes until soft.
4. Serve hot.
________________________________________

name: Cabbage and Carrot Thoran
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
2. Add cabbage, carrot, and turmeric. Sauté for 5-7 minutes.
3. Stir in coconut and mix well.

name: Spicy Roasted Cauliflower (Gobi Masala)
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 200°C.
2. Toss cauliflower with oil, turmeric, cumin, coriander, and garlic.
3. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20 minutes.
4. Serve warm.

name: Brown Rice Biryani with Vegetables
directions:
1. Rinse rice and soak for 10 minutes.
2. Heat a pan, add cumin seeds, cinnamon, and turmeric.
3. Add vegetables and cook for 2 minutes.
4. Add rice and water, cover, and cook for 20 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Moong Dal Pancakes (Cheela)
directions:
1. Blend soaked moong dal with water and spices into a smooth batter.
2. Heat a pan and pour a ladleful of batter, spreading it thin.
3. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side.
4. Serve warm.

name: Eggplant and Tomato Curry (Baingan Bharta)
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic.
2. Add tomatoes and turmeric, cook until soft.
3. Stir in mashed eggplant and cook for another 5 minutes.
4. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, add garlic and stir-fry chicken for 5 minutes.
2. Add vegetables and soy sauce, cook for another 5 minutes.
3. Serve warm.

name: Masoor Dal Soup
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pot, add cumin, and cook for 1 minute.
2. Add lentils, water, and tomatoes. Simmer for 15 minutes.
3. Serve warm.

name: Spiced Roasted Chickpeas
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 200°C.
2. Toss chickpeas with oil, turmeric, and cumin.
3. Bake for 20 minutes.

name: Vegetable Stuffed Bell Peppers
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Mix cooked quinoa, vegetables, and cumin.
3. Stuff mixture into bell pepper halves and bake for 15 minutes.

name: Low-Fat Chicken Kebab
directions:
1. Mix all ingredients and form into small patties.
2. Cook in a pan for 3-4 minutes per side.

name: Fruit Chaat with Chia Seeds
directions:
1. Toss fruits with lemon juice and chia seeds.
2. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Curry
directions:
1. Heat olive oil in a pan, add garlic and ginger, sauté for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes until lightly browned.
3. Stir in tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, and vegetable broth.
4. Cover and let simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Add mixed vegetables and cook for another 5 minutes.
6. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Spinach Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger for 30 seconds.
2. Add beef strips and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Add soy sauce and spinach, cook for another 2 minutes.
4. Serve warm.

name: Grilled Chicken Kebabs
directions:
1. In a bowl, mix yogurt, turmeric, cumin, coriander, garlic, and lemon juice.
2. Marinate chicken cubes for at least 30 minutes.
3. Preheat grill or stovetop pan, brush with olive oil.
4. Skewer the chicken cubes and grill for 8-10 minutes, flipping halfway.
5. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Lentil Stew
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pot, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add beef cubes, cook for 5 minutes until browned.
3. Stir in tomatoes, carrots, celery, turmeric, cumin, and broth.
4. Add lentils, cover, and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Cauliflower Rice Biryani
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, add garlic, sauté for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken, cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in spices and lemon juice.
4. Add cauliflower rice and cook for another 5 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Spiced Beef Kofta
directions:
1. Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
2. Form into small patties.
3. Grill or pan-fry for 6-8 minutes, flipping once.
4. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Chickpea Curry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken, cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in tomatoes, chickpeas, and spices.
4. Pour in broth, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger for 30 seconds.
2. Add beef strips, cook for 5 minutes.
3. Add vegetables and soy sauce, stir-fry for another 5 minutes.
4. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Sweet Potato Curry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken, cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in tomatoes, sweet potatoes, and spices.
4. Pour in broth, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Spiced Beef and Lentil Patties
directions:
1. Mash lentils and mix with beef and spices.
2. Form into small patties.
3. Pan-fry or grill for 6-8 minutes.
4. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Quinoa Pulao
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic until golden.
2. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in turmeric, cumin, and carrots.
4. Mix in cooked quinoa and stir-fry for another 3-5 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Eggplant Curry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add beef and cook for 5 minutes until browned.
3. Stir in tomatoes, eggplant, turmeric, and cumin.
4. Pour in broth, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Spinach Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Toss in spinach and soy sauce, stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes.
4. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Vegetable Kebabs
directions:
1. Mix beef cubes with garlic, cumin, turmeric, and oil.
2. Thread beef, bell peppers, and zucchini onto a skewer.
3. Grill or pan-fry for 8-10 minutes, turning halfway.
4. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Lentil Soup
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pot, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken, cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in tomatoes, carrots, and lentils.
4. Pour in broth and let simmer for 10-15 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Sweet Potato Hash
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic until soft.
2. Add beef and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in sweet potatoes, turmeric, and cumin.
4. Cover and cook for another 10 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Curry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in tomatoes, broccoli, and spices.
4. Pour in broth, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Cauliflower Rice Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger for 30 seconds.
2. Add beef strips and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in cauliflower rice and soy sauce.
4. Cook for another 3-5 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

name: Chicken and Zucchini Kebabs
directions:
1. Mix chicken with garlic, turmeric, cumin, and oil.
2. Thread onto skewers with zucchini and bell peppers.
3. Grill or pan-fry for 8-10 minutes, flipping halfway.
4. Serve warm.

name: Beef and Lentil Curry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add beef and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in tomatoes, lentils, and spices.
4. Pour in broth and let simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Serve warm

name: Chicken and Bell Pepper Stir-Fry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger for 30 seconds.
2. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Toss in bell peppers and onions, stir-fry for another 5 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and mix well.
5. Serve warm

name: Beef and Sweet Potato Curry
directions:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
2. Add beef and cook for 5 minutes.
3. Stir in tomatoes, sweet potatoes, and spices.
4. Pour in broth and let simmer for 10 minutes.
5. Serve warm.
